name: HabiThat: Notion Tracker Template
description: Track your habits in Notion and even your task with HabitThat!With HabitThat, you can effortlessly track your habits and tasks in Notion. This powerful tool offers a wide selection of habit icons, allowing you to customize your habit tracker to suit your needs. You can set daily goals for your habits and view the timeline of your progress and achievements.HabitThat also comes with an Eisenhower Matrix for task management, helping you prioritize your tasks and maximize your productivity. With the
features: Select from a long list of habit icons; Set daily goals for your habits; View the timeline of your habits; View your progress and achievements; Use the Eisenhower Matrix for task; View your daily or weekly agenda and habits
